testsuite.name: PlanerResource Unit Tests

testcase.name: Generate endpoint should reject configuration with empty player list
Generate endpoint should reject configuration with duplicate player names
Health endpoint should return OK status
Generate endpoint should reject configuration with 0 rounds
Pairings endpoint should return list of pairings sorted by frequency
Generate endpoint should reject configuration with less than 4 players
Generate endpoint should create plan with correct round dates
Statistics endpoint should return pairing statistics
Generate endpoint should accept valid schedule configuration
Generate endpoint should include creation timestamp
